__e: At any rate, all I would like to say to you well-wishers out there is that I shall do whatever the people want me to do because I am your humble, humble, servant.
It's my job to know people and what they want, what's behind their eyes.
And here's to those who wish us well, and those that don't can go to Hackensack.
Now,maybe in the backs of their minds they're hoping it's not you,for my sake.
The problem of working in the Hollywood system is the people are paid a lot of money to get you to do what they want you to do.
- They are coming in with something for you, they want you to wait.
